casebody.data:
Monday, June 7, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

99-941. State ex rel. The Ryant Commt. v. Lorain Cty. Bd. of Elections.

In Prohibition. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of prohibition regarding an expedited election matter. Upon consideration of the motion for leave to intervene by the city of Avon,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for leave to intervene by the city of Avon be, and hereby is, denied.

F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
